
## Install

```
npm install -g truffle
npm install -g genache-cli
npm install -g mocha
npm install -g eth-gas-reporter
npm install -g chai
npm install
```

# Run test

```
genache-cli --account 0x503d30470b57849f35972ba58d700153b214ae301121ba2dc389e04224bc2e87,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0xc09ae3abc13c501fb9ff1c3c8ad3256678416f73a41433411f1714ae7b547fe3,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0xecbcd49667c96bcf8b30ccb35234a0b217ea039a8e097d3a70de9d28624ba520,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0x1c98ac23c478461442a3d1489b9fd65779475b45c917ac1129db68d91b6654b8,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0x4f1c10dbf5a4c833e0f1e091ce06ba339c3194d249de8906a2b2ca642be07966,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0xe0ffe7cc4cd698cc18a012b473b6d09948d463ac6122462c0f1fca7aaa4b2467,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0xee8a7be04a25e07cb44497dfb3ec125e0098b5eab0580f1e5c3fb5bb8ef1589d,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0x8541b0d841a746e41f6093d16ab502c6179b727e775fb5feca77dd49e6b0ed8a,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0xc148e0908bdb5fdde1d06c7b61344e5719ab2e5cf2c24890db974bfd6af21830,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0xc4b730653072490a1f465ad5c4d7314005c61e30cb5f44784c203966492a3396,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0xfbc02def4107745fbc0de688535bb2b3239ad142614affc660845c3a2e0730f7,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0x31997ee61e6ad616ebde802e14b2a3c6b9a7d20d626a5aa326b9f4a741bab139,0x1000000000000000000 --account 0x88216efcd0fd7941538d564937dd35238b2610b7d0ab5cb3f3798eef7b010eb4,0x1000000000000000000 -i 999 -u 0 -u 1 -u 2 -u 3 -u 4 -u 5 -u 6 -u 7 -u 8 -u 9 -u 10 -l 200000000
```
